Topic.Title: Trying to publish a game as Public, but it only wants to be unlisted instead.

Posts.EditableText:
Hi. I have created a Quest Gamebook storygame, and I want it to be publicly released. I try to update the listing, and click the option that says everyone should be able to see the game, but when I view the listing, it states that it is listed as unlisted. Can someone please fix this, or tell me what I need to do to fix it?

The name of the project is Pokemon: The Fletchling Tales I
Posts.HTML:
Hi. I have created a Quest Gamebook storygame, and I want it to be publicly released. I try to update the listing, and click the option that says everyone should be able to see the game, but when I view the listing, it states that it is listed as unlisted. Can someone please fix this, or tell me what I need to do to fix it?

The name of the project is Pokemon: The Fletchling Tales I
